Header: Disaster pre-training program for Matale district
Content: COLOMBO (News 1st) â€“ A disaster pre-training program is scheduled to be conducted, covering all eight Divisional Secretariat areas in the Matale district. The pre-training program will cover 40 areas of the Matale District. Assistant Director of the Disaster Management Center Pradeep Kodippilli said that the pre-training programme will be carried out in Raththota, Ukuwela, Matale, Pallepola, Yatawatta, Ambanpola, Dambulla and Wilgamuwa.
